extendedInfo.description: One of the hottest iPhone apps is now available on the Android phone:  GPS Phone Tracker.Now you can transform your phone into a premium GPS tracking device and follow the movements of other phones.  You can have the peace-of-mind to know your kids arrived safely at school/home, your spouse is safe while traveling, and your family can notify you where they are located during times of need.Use your phone to see where your friends and family are in your city or across the globe.â Follow multiple people on a single mapâ See people's movements for the past 48 hoursâ Locate anyone with an accuracy of 30 feet (10 meters)â Log locations from every 2 minutes to 60 minutesâ Attach photos to identify users on mapsâ Select time frame to see other's movementsâ Use satellite maps or street mapsThe "GPS Phone Tracker" combines the robust GPS functionality of the Android platform with the most popular internet mapping tool to create a secure, permission-based system that allows people to see each other's current location as well follow their movements for the past 48 hours.With the "GPS Phone Tracker" you can:â Follow kids movements during the dayâ Know where family is at any timeâ Track employees  during work hoursâ Locate friendsâ Find lost or stolen phonesâ This version allows you to track 2 other phones.  Upgrade to follow up to 10 people.â To follow another person, they must use the "GPS Phone Tracker" to grant you permission.Please note: This app is not a toy...it is a real tracking system.  It will let others follow you and track your movements while the app is running.  Please use this app responsibly and ONLY let people you trust follow you.

reviews.title: Good idea, horable implementations
reviews.comment: One of not many apps i Wasted my money on... it is too buggy and Instable... looks like developer started work on it then run out of money and decided to sell \"product as is\". Does nor work on t989.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: ATrevino
reviews.comment: I want my money back! This is a replica of a free one! Rip-Off!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Great app. I love seeing where my family is. Super accurate mapping!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Never received activation code!
reviews.comment: Never received activation code, they never responded to the 4 emails I sent. And haven\'t responded to the 2 emails I sent requesting $ back. Don\'t purchase! Rip off!
reviews.author: A Google User
